Package main.tests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Test1
    Test stub for the FileSystem
    Test10
    Tests if the following cases are handled properly: Pinning an allocated page. Propagating changes to disk (Check if a dirty page is written to disk). Pinning a page in wrong file/nonexistent file.
    Test11
    Tests if the following cases are handled properly: Pinning an allocated page. Flushing all the pages. Erasing a file. Flushing all the pages twice.
    Test12  
    Test2
    Tests the pinPage, unpinPage, and writing dirty pages to disk.
    Test3
    Tests the LRU replacement policy.
    Test4
    Tests the clock replacement policy.
    Test5
    Tests the MRU replacement policy.
    Test6  
    Test7  
    Test8
    Test newPage, pinPage, unpinPage, and whether a dirty page is written to disk.
    Test9
    Tests if the following cases are handled properly: Unpinning a page twice. Pinning a nonexistent page. Unpinning a nonexistent page. Freeing a page that is still pinned. Filling the buffer pool with pinned pages and pinning 1 more page.
